verses.verse: The <S%G1565>same<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> out of the <S%G3614>house,<s%> and <S%G2521>sat<s%> by the <S%G2281>sea<s%> <S%G3844>side.<s%>

And <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> were <S%G4863>gathered<s%> <S%G4863>together<s%> to him, <S%G5620>so<s%> that he <S%G1684>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G4143>ship,<s%> and <S%G2521>sat;<s%> and the <S%G3956>whole<s%> <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G123>shore.<s%>

And he <S%G2980>spoke<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> things to them in <S%G3850>parables,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> a <S%G4687>sower<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> <S%G1831>forth<s%> to sow; <S%G4687><s%>

And when <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> he <S%G4687>sowed,<s%> some <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3303><s%> seeds <S%G4098>fell<s%> by the <S%G3598>way<s%> <S%G3844>side,<s%> and the <S%G4071>fowls<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G2719>devoured<s%> them up:

Some <S%G3588><s%> <S%G243><s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> on <S%G4075>stony<s%> places, <S%G3699>where<s%> they <S%G2192>had<s%> not <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G1093>earth:<s%> and <S%G2112>immediately<s%> they <S%G1816>sprung<s%> up, <S%G1223>because<s%> they <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G899>deepness<s%> of earth: <S%G1093><s%>
And when the <S%G2246>sun<s%> was up, they were <S%G2739>scorched;<s%> and <S%G1223>because<s%> they <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G4491>root,<s%> they <S%G3583>withered<s%> away.
And some <S%G3588><s%> <S%G243><s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> <S%G1909>among<s%> <S%G173>thorns;<s%> and the <S%G173>thorns<s%> <S%G305>sprung<s%> up, and <S%G638>choked<s%> them:

But <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> <S%G1909>into<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G1093>ground,<s%> and <S%G1325>brought<s%> forth <S%G2590>fruit,<s%> some <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3303><s%> an hundred <S%G1540>times,<s%> some <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1161><s%> sixty <S%G1835>times,<s%> some <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1161><s%> thirty times. <S%G5144><s%>
<S%G3588>Who<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G3775>ears<s%> to <S%G191>hear,<s%> let him hear. <S%G191><s%>
And the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4334>came,<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G1302>Why<s%> <S%G2980>speak<s%> you to them in <S%G3850>parables?<s%>

He <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G3754>Because<s%> it is <S%G1325>given<s%> to you to <S%G1097>know<s%> the <S%G3466>mysteries<s%> of the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> but to them it is not given. <S%G1325><s%>

For <S%G3748>whoever<s%> <S%G2192>has,<s%> to him shall be <S%G1325>given,<s%> and he shall have more <S%G4052>abundance:<s%> but <S%G3748>whoever<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> not, from him shall be <S%G142>taken<s%> <S%G142>away<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> that he has. <S%G2192><s%>

Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> <S%G2980>speak<s%> I to them in <S%G3850>parables:<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> they <S%G991>seeing<s%> <S%G991>see<s%> not; and <S%G191>hearing<s%> they <S%G191>hear<s%> not, <S%G3761>neither<s%> do they understand. <S%G4920><s%>

And in them is <S%G378>fulfilled<s%> the <S%G4394>prophecy<s%> of <S%G2268>Esaias,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> By <S%G189>hearing<s%> you shall <S%G191>hear,<s%> and shall not <S%G4920>understand;<s%> and <S%G991>seeing<s%> you shall <S%G991>see,<s%> and shall not perceive: <S%G1492><s%>

For <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G2992>people's<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> is <S%G3975>waxed<s%> <S%G3975>gross,<s%> and their <S%G3775>ears<s%> are <S%G917>dull<s%> of <S%G191>hearing,<s%> and their <S%G3788>eyes<s%> they have <S%G2576>closed;<s%> <S%G3379>lest<s%> <S%G3379>at<s%> <S%G3379>any<s%> <S%G3379>time<s%> they should <S%G1492>see<s%> with their <S%G3788>eyes<s%> and <S%G191>hear<s%> with their <S%G3775>ears,<s%> and should <S%G4920>understand<s%> with their <S%G2588>heart,<s%> and should be <S%G1994>converted,<s%> and I should <S%G2390>heal<s%> them.
But blessed <S%G3107><s%> are <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3788>eyes,<s%> for they <S%G991>see:<s%> and <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3775>ears,<s%> for they hear. <S%G191><s%>

For <S%G281>truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, That <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4396>prophets<s%> and righteous <S%G1342><s%> men have <S%G1939>desired<s%> to see <S%G1492><s%> those things <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G991>see,<s%> and have not seen <S%G1492><s%> them; and to hear <S%G191><s%> those things <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G191>hear,<s%> and have not heard <S%G191><s%> them.
<S%G191>Hear<s%> you <S%G3767>therefore<s%> the <S%G3850>parable<s%> of the sower. <S%G4687><s%>

When <S%G3956>any<s%> one <S%G191>hears<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of the <S%G932>kingdom,<s%> and understands <S%G4920><s%> it not, then <S%G2064>comes<s%> the wicked <S%G4190><s%> one, and <S%G726>catches<s%> <S%G726>away<s%> that <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G4687>sown<s%> in his <S%G2588>heart.<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> is he <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G4687>received<s%> <S%G4687>seed<s%> by the <S%G3598>way<s%> side. <S%G3844><s%>

But he that <S%G4687>received<s%> the <S%G4687>seed<s%> <S%G1909>into<s%> <S%G4075>stony<s%> places, the <S%G3778>same<s%> is he that <S%G191>hears<s%> the <S%G3056>word,<s%> and <S%G2117>immediately<s%> with <S%G5479>joy<s%> <S%G2983>receives<s%> it;

<S%G1161>Yet<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> he not <S%G4491>root<s%> in <S%G1438>himself,<s%> but <S%G2076>endures<s%> for a <S%G4340>while:<s%> for when <S%G2347>tribulation<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1375>persecution<s%> <S%G1096>rises<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G3056>word,<s%> by and by he is offended. <S%G4624><s%>

He <S%G1161>also<s%> that <S%G4687>received<s%> <S%G4687>seed<s%> <S%G1519>among<s%> the <S%G173>thorns<s%> is he that <S%G191>hears<s%> the <S%G3056>word;<s%> and the <S%G3308>care<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G165>world,<s%> and the <S%G539>deceitfulness<s%> of <S%G4149>riches,<s%> <S%G4846>choke<s%> the <S%G3056>word,<s%> and he <S%G1096>becomes<s%> unfruitful. <S%G175><s%>

But he that <S%G4687>received<s%> <S%G4687>seed<s%> <S%G1909>into<s%> the <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G1093>ground<s%> is he that <S%G191>hears<s%> the <S%G3056>word,<s%> and understands <S%G4920><s%> it; <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G1211>also<s%> <S%G2592>bears<s%> <S%G2592>fruit,<s%> and <S%G4160>brings<s%> <S%G4160>forth,<s%> some <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3033><s%> an hundred <S%G1540>times,<s%> some <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1835>sixty,<s%> some <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1161><s%> thirty. <S%G5144><s%>

<S%G243>Another<s%> <S%G3850>parable<s%> <S%G3908>put<s%> he <S%G3908>forth<s%> to them, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> The <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> is <S%G3666>likened<s%> to a <S%G444>man<s%> which <S%G4687>sowed<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G4690>seed<s%> in his field: <S%G68><s%>

But while <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G2518>slept,<s%> his <S%G2190>enemy<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G4687>sowed<s%> <S%G2215>tares<s%> among <S%G303><s%> <S%G3319><s%> the <S%G4621>wheat,<s%> and <S%G565>went<s%> his way.

But <S%G3753>when<s%> the <S%G5528>blade<s%> was <S%G985>sprung<s%> up, and <S%G4160>brought<s%> <S%G4160>forth<s%> <S%G2590>fruit,<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> <S%G5316>appeared<s%> the <S%G2215>tares<s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>

<S%G1161>So<s%> the <S%G1401>servants<s%> of the <S%G3617>householder<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G2962>Sir,<s%> did not you <S%G4687>sow<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G4690>seed<s%> in your <S%G68>field?<s%> from <S%G4159>where<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> it tares? <S%G2215><s%>

He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, An <S%G2190>enemy<s%> has <S%G4160>done<s%> <S%G5124>this.<s%> The <S%G1401>servants<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> to him, <S%G2309>Will<s%> you <S%G3767>then<s%> that we <S%G565>go<s%> and <S%G4816>gather<s%> them up?
But he <S%G5346>said,<s%> <S%G3756>No;<s%> <S%G3379>lest<s%> while you <S%G4816>gather<s%> up the <S%G2215>tares,<s%> you <S%G1610>root<s%> up <S%G260>also<s%> the <S%G4621>wheat<s%> with them.

<S%G863>Let<s%> <S%G297>both<s%> <S%G4885>grow<s%> <S%G4885>together<s%> <S%G3360>until<s%> the <S%G2326>harvest:<s%> and in the <S%G2540>time<s%> of <S%G2326>harvest<s%> I will <S%G2046>say<s%> to the <S%G2327>reapers,<s%> <S%G4816>Gather<s%> you <S%G4816>together<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%> the <S%G2215>tares,<s%> and <S%G1210>bind<s%> them in <S%G1197>bundles<s%> to <S%G2618>burn<s%> them: but <S%G4863>gather<s%> the <S%G4621>wheat<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> my barn. <S%G596><s%>

<S%G243>Another<s%> <S%G3850>parable<s%> <S%G3908>put<s%> he <S%G3908>forth<s%> to them, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> The <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> is <S%G3664>like<s%> to a <S%G2848>grain<s%> of <S%G4615>mustard<s%> seed, <S%G3739>which<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2983>took,<s%> and <S%G4687>sowed<s%> in his field: <S%G68><s%>

<S%G3739>Which<s%> <S%G3303>indeed<s%> is the <S%G3398>least<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4690>seeds:<s%> but <S%G3752>when<s%> it is <S%G837>grown,<s%> it is the <S%G3187>greatest<s%> among <S%G3001>herbs,<s%> and <S%G1096>becomes<s%> a <S%G1186>tree,<s%> <S%G5620>so<s%> that the <S%G4071>birds<s%> of the <S%G3772>air<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> and <S%G2681>lodge<s%> in the <S%G2798>branches<s%> thereof. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G243>Another<s%> <S%G3850>parable<s%> <S%G2980>spoke<s%> he to them; The <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> is <S%G3664>like<s%> to <S%G2219>leaven,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> a <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G2983>took,<s%> and <S%G1470>hid<s%> in <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G4568>measures<s%> of <S%G224>meal,<s%> <S%G2193>till<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> was leavened. <S%G2220><s%>

<S%G3956>All<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things <S%G2980>spoke<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> to the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> in <S%G3850>parables;<s%> and <S%G5565>without<s%> a <S%G3850>parable<s%> <S%G2980>spoke<s%> he not to them:

That it might be <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G4483>spoken<s%> by the <S%G4396>prophet,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> I will <S%G455>open<s%> my <S%G4750>mouth<s%> in <S%G3850>parables;<s%> I will <S%G2044>utter<s%> things which have been kept <S%G2928>secret<s%> from the <S%G2602>foundation<s%> of the <S%G2889>world.<s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G863>sent<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G863>away,<s%> and <S%G2064>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3614>house:<s%> and his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5419>Declare<s%> to us the <S%G3850>parable<s%> of the <S%G2215>tares<s%> of the <S%G68>field.<s%>
He <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, He that <S%G4687>sows<s%> the <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G4690>seed<s%> is the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of man; <S%G444><s%>

The <S%G68>field<s%> is the <S%G2889>world;<s%> the <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G4690>seed<s%> are the <S%G5207>children<s%> of the <S%G932>kingdom;<s%> but the <S%G2215>tares<s%> are the <S%G5207>children<s%> of the wicked <S%G4190><s%> one;

The <S%G2190>enemy<s%> that <S%G4687>sowed<s%> them is the <S%G1228>devil;<s%> the <S%G2326>harvest<s%> is the <S%G4930>end<s%> of the <S%G165>world;<s%> and the <S%G2327>reapers<s%> are the angels. <S%G32><s%>

As <S%G3767>therefore<s%> the <S%G2215>tares<s%> are <S%G4816>gathered<s%> and <S%G2618>burned<s%> in the <S%G4442>fire;<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> shall it be in the <S%G4930>end<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> world. <S%G165><s%>

The <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> shall <S%G649>send<s%> <S%G649>forth<s%> his <S%G32>angels,<s%> and they shall <S%G4816>gather<s%> out of his <S%G932>kingdom<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things that <S%G4625>offend,<s%> and them which <S%G4160>do<s%> iniquity; <S%G458><s%>
And shall <S%G906>cast<s%> them <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G2575>furnace<s%> of <S%G4442>fire:<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> shall be <S%G2805>wailing<s%> and <S%G1030>gnashing<s%> of teeth. <S%G3599><s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> shall the <S%G1342>righteous<s%> <S%G1584>shine<s%> <S%G1584>forth<s%> as the <S%G2246>sun<s%> in the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of their <S%G3962>Father.<s%> <S%G3588>Who<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G3775>ears<s%> to <S%G191>hear,<s%> let him hear. <S%G191><s%>

<S%G3825>Again,<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> is <S%G3664>like<s%> to <S%G2344>treasure<s%> <S%G2928>hid<s%> in a <S%G68>field;<s%> the <S%G3739>which<s%> when a <S%G444>man<s%> has <S%G2147>found,<s%> he <S%G2928>hides,<s%> and for <S%G5479>joy<s%> <S%G846>thereof<s%> <S%G5217>goes<s%> and <S%G4453>sells<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that he <S%G2192>has,<s%> and <S%G59>buys<s%> that field. <S%G68><s%>
<S%G3825>Again,<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> is <S%G3664>like<s%> to a <S%G1713>merchant<s%> <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G2212>seeking<s%> <S%G2573>goodly<s%> pearls: <S%G3135><s%>

<S%G3739>Who,<s%> when he had <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G3135>pearl<s%> of <S%G4186>great<s%> <S%G4186>price,<s%> <S%G565>went<s%> and <S%G4097>sold<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that he <S%G2192>had,<s%> and <S%G59>bought<s%> it.

<S%G3825>Again,<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> is <S%G3664>like<s%> to a <S%G4522>net,<s%> that was <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> and <S%G4863>gathered<s%> of <S%G3956>every<s%> kind: <S%G1085><s%>

<S%G3739>Which,<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> it was <S%G4137>full,<s%> they <S%G307>drew<s%> to <S%G123>shore,<s%> and <S%G2523>sat<s%> <S%G2523>down,<s%> and <S%G4816>gathered<s%> the <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G30>vessels,<s%> but <S%G906>cast<s%> the <S%G4550>bad<s%> away. <S%G1854><s%>

<S%G3779>So<s%> shall it be <S%G1722>at<s%> the <S%G4930>end<s%> of the <S%G165>world:<s%> the <S%G32>angels<s%> shall <S%G1831>come<s%> <S%G1831>forth,<s%> and <S%G873>sever<s%> the <S%G4190>wicked<s%> from <S%G3319>among<s%> the just, <S%G1342><s%>
